channel.title: Holiday events?
channel.description:
alright well its been awhile since I have done private servers and such, and I was wondering if there was a way I can code in holiday events like Xmas, Halloween, thanks giving, ETC
so could someone tell me how to code it into the server
I am using a 562 source.
